mapper.select: SELECT repno , brdno , userno , rcontent , rgroup , rparent , rdeletat , regdate , updatedate FROM tbl_sreply WHERE brdno = #{brdno} AND rdeletat = 'N' ORDER BY repno DESC

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT repno , brdno , userno , CONCAT(REPEAT(' ', LEVEL - 1), IF(tr.rdeletat = 'Y', '[삭제된 댓글입니다]', tr.rcontent)) AS rcontent , rgroup , rparent , rdeletat , DATE_FORMAT(regdate, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') regdate , DATE_FORMAT(updatedate, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') updatedate , (SELECT u.username FROM tbl_sreply r, tbl_suser u WHERE r.repno = tr.repno AND u.userno = r.userno) uname , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tbl_sreply WHERE rparent = tr.repno) childCnt , (SELECT u.username FROM tbl_sreply r, tbl_suser u WHERE r.repno = tr.rparent AND u.userno = r.userno) pname , (SELECT rdeletat FROM tbl_sreply WHERE repno = tr.rparent) pdelete , func.level FROM ( SELECT fn_reply_structure() AS f_repno , @level AS LEVEL FROM ( SELECT @start_with:=0 , @repno:=@start_with , @level:=0 ) vars JOIN tbl_sreply WHERE @repno IS NOT NULL ) func JOIN tbl_sreply tr ON func.f_repno = tr.repno ) re WHERE ( re.childCnt = 0 AND re.rparent = 0 AND re.rdeletat = "N" ) OR ( re.childCnt > 0 AND re.rparent = 0) OR ( re.rparent > 0 AND re.rdeletat = "N") ) fin WHERE fin.brdno = #{brdno} LIMIT #{cri.pageStart}, #{cri.perPageNum}
